title: Epena (2010) New Testament
description: Epena is a village of 2000 people, and seat of Epena District in the Likouala Department of northeastern Republic of the Congo. It is on the Likouala-aux-Herbes river, just east of the Lake Télé Community Reserve.

language.name: Epena
language.area: South Pacific coast, Caucá, Nariño, Chocó departments. Also in Ecuador, Panama.
